modName: Music Replacer Vampire The Masquerade Bloodlines - DELETED
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]Replaces all music with one of Game,Vampire The Masquerade Bloodlines music.
I tried to seek permission from game developers Troika Games,but it is long since they have been shuted down,
So if anyone has something to say about license,contact me.
I used only the original game music,the licensed music I did not use,so in Taverns you will hear some Vampiric themed music
instead of licensed music from VTMB or vanilla tavern music.

Just download and put the folder Music into data folder.

Hope you Like itÂ  :)[/size][/font]
author: ibrica_orahovac
